cause.description:
Alzheimer's disease is the most form of dementia,a group of disorders that impair mental funtioning,memory loss is one of the early symptoms,along with gadual decline of other intellectual abilities,alzheimer's is a uncurable disease but research is been done right now to found that cure.
1. Help us find a cure.
2. Help the families of that have a loved 1 with these disease.
cause.mission: Aware the public of these disease
cause.name: Alzheimer's.Awareness.Organization
